text: Notting Hill is a 1999 British-American romantic comedy-drama movie. It is set in Notting Hill, west London. It was written by Richard Curtis. It stars Julia Roberts as Hollywood actress Anna Scott and Hugh Grant as book shop owner Will Thacker. == Other websites == * Category:1999 comedy-drama movies Category:1999 romantic comedy movies Category:1999 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Notting Hill Category:Movies directed by Roger Michell
title: Notting Hill (movie)
